a. The communities Geri (1024), Tseri (1225), Sotira Ammochostou (3103), Livadia Larnakas (4011) ___ Ypsonas (5021) have been declared municipalities in November 2011.
b. The communities  Dromolaxia and Meneou have merged into the municipality, namely Dromolaxia - Meneou in November 2011.
c. A new community (Troodos) with geocode 5356 has been established in 2015. In 2011 this community was included in Pano Platres.
